description: Defines the settings for Front Matter data file
title: Front Matter - data file

id.description: Your unique ID you want to use for your data file.

title.description: Title you want to give to your data file.

labelField.description: The field you want to use as label for your data entries.

file.description: Path to the file to load. Only JSON or YAML files are supported.

fileType.description: Defines how you want to parse the file. JSON is the default.

schema.description: The JSON schema for your data which will be used to render the data form.

type.description: Defines the type of the form. Default is 'object'.

required.description: Defines the required fields for the form.

properties.description: Defines the fields of the form.

type.description: If you are using data types, you can specify your type ID.

singleEntry.description: If you want to use a single entry for your data file.
